20110115051120.000|20110115051124.000|CC1|BUYING MORE OF THE AS A         
20110115051124.000|20110115051127.000|CC1|CONSEQUENCE THE FISCAL DEFICIT  
20110115051127.000|20110115051130.000|CC1|STAYS HIGH, BUT THE CURRENT     
20110115051130.000|20110115051134.000|CC1|ACCOUNT DEFICIT COMES DOWN.     
20110115051134.000|20110115051136.000|CC1|THAT MEANS THE U.S. IS DEPENDING
20110115051136.000|20110115051138.000|CC1|LESS ON FOREIGNERS.             
20110115051138.000|20110115051141.000|CC1|>> DOES IT MAKE SENSE TO SAY ANY
20110115051141.000|20110115051143.000|CC1|TAX CUT DOES NOT HAVE TO BE
